short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kleo Network is a user consumption DATA DAO. Use your data to it's maximum potential.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kleo Network is a user consumption DATA DAO. For the users, it's a simple chrome extension that anyone can download and own their consumption data, for data seekers it's a SDK which allows for personalization for a specific user or getting pooled data of lot of users. The users get rewards for their data periodically along with deeper personalisation experiences on partner sites, thus keeping them incentivized. For the SDK users, it offers quick and realtime access to high quality data to build AI models, thus democratizing data access.
